full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHING BZO KUN DGA'I LO RGYUS DANG SBYAR NAS GRAGS 'DOD KYI 'CHAD NYAN BYED MKHAN RNAMS KYI RTOGS PA BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
